channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Video Sidebar Widgets
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Video Sidebar Widgets

item.title: CVE-2022-4785|2024-08-03T01:48:40.394Z -- unknown -- video%20sidebar%20widgets
item.description: The Video Sidebar Widgets WordPress plugin through 6.1 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
